name: Forgotten City (Zcyon, rucalv, Daniel Reyes T, jaaavi_4)
name_original: Forgotten City (Zcyon, rucalv, Daniel Reyes T, jaaavi_4)
description:
Forgotten City (Zcyon, rucalv, Daniel Reyes T, jaaavi_4) is a platformer game developed by Zcyon, rucalv and Daniel Reyes T. It was originally released in 2022.
You can play Forgotten City (Zcyon, rucalv, Daniel Reyes T, jaaavi_4) on Web. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
